availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Beal (Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer and cooper.)

body.p: Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer and cooper. Kentucky native. Married to Pernecia W. Beal. Father of Rebecca Beal, James W. Beal, Joseph Beal, Lysander Beal, Sarah E. Beal, William J. Beal, and Julie Beal. Famer in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Cooper in Webster County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District No. 2, p. 313B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 464.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 3, p. 206B.
"William Beal (unknown-1891)," Find A Grave, Memorial #64663948, accessed July 27 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/64663948/william-beal.
"Pernecia Beal (unknown-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial #64663947, accessed July 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/64663947/pernecia-beal.
